description: Spreadsheet is an application focused on improving computation, organization and presentation of information with key focus on ease of use. Application is useful for both personal and professional work. The app simulates a paper, accounting worksheet. It displays multiple cells in a two-dimensional matrix or grid consisting of rows and columns. Each cell contains alphanumeric text, numeric values or formulas. A formula defines how the content of that cell is to be calculated from the contents of any other cell (or combination of cells) each time any cell is updated. The app is very useful while working with financial information because of its ability to re-calculate the entire sheet automatically after a change to a single cell is made.
